text:
If I select Loop count as 2 with ramp up time of 60 seconds. Now even if my first thread ends at 10th seconds of first loop. My next loop starts.
If I have an requirement where next loop is required to be started only after my Ramp up time (60 in this case) for first loop exhausted, then I don't see any option for that.
creator: kumarnipun2005@gmail.com
